title: The 1-3-5 Story Structure Made SImple System
description: Trying to sell or rewrite a screenplay? Former story analyst DMA used to stand between you and a sale, but now she is on your side. This streamlined guide walks you through unifying theme, character and spine to create a structurally sound script that can get past the "gatekeepers" at production companies and studios.
author: DMA/Donna Michelle Anderson
